content: Nov 23 Canadian telecom company Manitoba Telecom Services Inc said on Monday it had agreed to sell its unit  Allstream Inc  to U.S.-based Zayo Group Holdings Inc  for C$465 million ($347.4 million) in cash.
name: Zayo Group Holdings Inc
title: Manitoba Telecom to sell unit to Zayo for C$465 mln
